target: Please confirm there will be 3 people arriving in London tomorrow and leaving on March 13th.
context: <user>  I will be visiting London, UK and I am looking for a house to rent. <system>  There is a house with a 4.3 rating located at 1 Addington Street available for rent. <user>  That location would be perfect. <system>  Are you interested in reserving this house for your trip? <user>  Yes, I would like to rent this house. <system>  What will be your dates of stay and will there be more than one person in your group? <user>  There will be three people in the group and we will be arriving on Saturday this week and leaving on March 13th. <system>
